text: Hey team, quick FTP heads up: we’ll be removing the `modules` and `templates` directories from FTP soon. These directories don’t reflect your Design Tools file structure accurately, and can cause some confusion. Moving forward, everything you need will be in the `designs` directory. *Note that any FTP scripts should be updated to use the `/designs` directory.*
made it easy to find files in big sites with tons of folders. or jump right into a custom module that’s in a site that isn’t organized well or has a lot of modules/folders
